snippet: A deputy speaker of Parliament, Nigel Evans, resigned from the post after he was charged with eight counts of sexual assault, including rape, dating from 2002 until this year.
abstract: Nigel Evans, deputy speaker of British Parliament, resigns from the post after he is charged with eight counts of sexual assault, including rape, dating from 2002 until earlier this year.
lead_paragraph: A deputy speaker of Parliament, Nigel Evans, resigned from the post after he was charged with eight counts of sexual assault, including rape, dating from 2002 until this year.

headline.main: Britain: Politician Leaves a Post After Assault Charges
headline.print_headline: Britain: Politician Leaves a Post After Assault Charges
